thread.title: Japan's robot expo sparks debate on future of work

title: Japan's robot expo sparks debate on future of work
text:
Japan's robot expo sparks debate on future of work 8:47pm IST - 01:28 
Nearly 200 companies have gathered in Tokyo to showcase the latest in robotic industry technology. As Sonia Legg reports, Japan is hoping they are part of the answer to a labour shortage caused by an ageing population.   
Nearly 200 companies have gathered in Tokyo to showcase the latest in robotic industry technology. As Sonia Legg reports, Japan is hoping they are part of the answer to a labour shortage caused by an ageing population.  //reut.rs/2mLkUEF
